H0.text: Colchester stands on which river? The river shares its name with a Lancashire town.. Stour

H1.text: Colchester stands on which river? The river shares its name with a Lancashire town.. Thames

H2.text: Colchester stands on which river? The river shares its name with a Lancashire town.. Lea

H3.text: Colchester stands on which river? The river shares its name with a Lancashire town.. Colne

A4.text: Colne is a market town and civil parish in the Borough of Pendle in Lancashire, England.
